movies.title: Terre sans pain
movies.plot: In this documentary short by director he travels to Las Hurdes, a remote region of Spain which was connected to the outside world only in 1922 with the completion of a road. The residents of the area - spread across several villages - lives in poverty and in isolation from the outside world. They survive mostly on a diet of potatoes and beans with meat available only a few days a week. In fact, they eat goat meat only when one of the animals dies. Inbreeding results in a disproportionately large number of people with mental disabilities. The title refers to the fact that the residents did not know how to make bread.
movies.simplePlot: A surrealistic documentary portrait of the region of Las Hurdes, a remote region of Spain where civilisation has barely developed, showing how the local peasants try to survive without even the most basic utilities and skills.

biography.bio: Abel Jacquin was born on July 14, 1893 in Colombes, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He was an actor and director, known for Le défroqué (1954), Ultimatum (1938) and Anne-Marie (1936). He died on May 12, 1968 in Bois-Colombes, Hauts-de-Seine.
biography.name: Abel Jacquin

biography.bio: Alexandre O'Neill was born on December 19, 1924 in Lisbon, Portugal. He was a writer, known for Dom Roberto (1962), Nós por cá Todos Bem (1978) and Vermelho, Amarelo e Verde (1966). He was married to Maria Teresa Pinto Basto Patrício de Gouveia and Noémia Delgado. He died on August 21, 1986 in Lisbon.
biography.name: Alexandre O'Neill
